widget.label: Website Settings
widget.help: Basic information that better defines your website.

widget.label: Long Site Name
widget.background-value: long version of your site name
widget.tooltip: Enter the really long version of your website name. The long version is used in only a few places such as your home page.
widget.help: This name represents the name of your website. In most cases it is used in a few places such as your home page. It may also appear in your RSS feed and other similar locations. The system uses your site name if the long version is not defined.

widget.label: Site Name
widget.tooltip: Enter your website name. This name appears in the title tag of your header (i.e. the one that appears in the title bar of desktop windows).
widget.help: This name represents the name of your website. The site name is expected to be relatively short as it will appear in many locations where a name that's too long may not work well. If you also have a very long version of your website name, use the Long Site Name box above for it.

widget.label: Short Site Name
widget.background-value: short version of your site name
widget.tooltip: Enter a really short version of your website name, as short as possible.
widget.help: The website name is at times used in very small places such as a small column on the side. In that case the short version of the name is used.

widget.label: Save
widget.tooltip: Click this button to save your changes.
widget.help: Make sure to click the Save button so your changes get commited to the database.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the administration page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the administration page.
